healthTips.title: Stay Hydrated
healthTips.description: Drink plenty of water throughout the day to stay hydrated and maintain good health.

healthTips.title: Get Enough Sleep
healthTips.description: Make sure to get 7-8 hours of quality sleep each night to support your overall well-being.

healthTips.title: Eat a Balanced Diet
healthTips.description: Include a variety of fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and lean proteins in your daily meals for optimal nutrition.

healthTips.title: Exercise Regularly
healthTips.description: Engage in physical activity for at least 30 minutes a day to improve your fitness and overall health.

healthTips.title: Practice Stress Management
healthTips.description: Find healthy ways to manage stress, such as meditation, deep breathing exercises, or engaging in hobbies.

healthTips.title: Maintain Good Posture
healthTips.description: Pay attention to your posture while sitting and standing to prevent back and neck pain.

newProducts.name: Ibuprofen
newProducts.description: Relieves pain, reduces inflammation, and lowers fever.

newProducts.name: Amoxicillin
newProducts.description: An antibiotic used to treat various bacterial infections.

newProducts.name: Vitamin C
newProducts.description: Boosts immune system and helps prevent common colds.

newProducts.name: Aspirin
newProducts.description: Used to relieve pain, reduce inflammation, and prevent blood clots.

newProducts.name: Lisinopril
newProducts.description: A medication used to treat high blood pressure and heart failure.
